entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
